/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of motion and life. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The buildings lining the street are tall and modern, their glass and steel facades reflecting the sunlight. The street itself is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. A yellow car can be seen driving down the road, adding a pop of color to the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of scale to the scene.
